QueryResults.Content:
Coots 
         
      
      
      
       
         	 
         Coots are any of ten species of ducklike water-dwelling birds. Coots are found throughout the world in larger inland waters
            and streams, where they swim and bob for food, mostly plants, seeds, mollusks, and worms. Coots have greenish or bluish gray
            feet, the toes of which are fringed by a lobed membrane that facilitates swimming and walking over plant-choked marshes and
            ooze. The beak is short and conical, surmounted by a flattened fleshy shield that extends onto the forehead. 
            	 
         
         
         	 
         
            		
            
               		
            
            
            	 
         
         
         	 
         The European coot (F. atra) breeds abundantly in many northern parts of the Old World, in winter resorting to river mouths
            or shallow bays of the sea. About 45 centimetres (18 inches) long and sometimes more than 900 grams (2 pounds) in weight,
            the seemingly short-winged coot appears to rise with difficulty from the water, pattering along the surface with its feet.
            It is capable of long-sustained and rapid flight. Although not considered to be game birds, coots sometimes are hunted in
            winter, when they are most gregarious. 
            	 
         
         
         	 
         Coots nest in masses of water plants, laying as many as ten speckled eggs. The young are beautifully clothed in jet-black
            down, with heads of bright orange scarlet, varied with purplish blue. This brilliant colouring is soon lost; adults have sooty
            black plumage and a bare white callus on the forehead. 
            	 
         
         
         	 
         The coot of North America, or mud hen (F. americana), closely resembles the European bird. In South America about six species
            are found, one (F. gigantea) being of considerable size; F. caribaea occurs also in the West Indies. An African species (F.
            cristata) is distinguished by two red knobs on the forehead. 
            	 
         
         
         	 
         The scoter, a diving duck of the family Anatidae, is also called a sea coot. 
            	 
         
         
         	 
         For more information: 
            		Encyclopedia Britannica - Coot (bird) 
            	 
         
         
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Parent topic: Other birds

Home and Home Office
      
      	
      
         		
         
            
               				
                  					Select Home
                     and Home Office in the Technical Support
                     Options page and click Continue.
                  The Link to Additional Information page appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                  
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  					
                  Note: This screen varies based on the software you have
                     installed (sometimes you may find just a single option for additional
                     support).
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Click Finish and provide your
                  feedback on the Thank You page to complete
                  the MVT process.

Corporate products
      
      	
      
         		
         
            
               				
                  					Start Internet
                     Explorer.
               			
            
            
            
               				Type the URL https://mysupport.mcafee.com/eservice_enu in
                  the address bar and click Go. The McAfee
                     ServicePortal Home page appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Click Run McAfee Virtual Technician.
                  A Welcome page appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Click Next. The Run
                     Application page appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Click Next. The File
                     Download dialog box appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Click Run to launch the MVT executable
                  (mvtapp.exe) from the default location. The McAfee Virtual
                     Technician - Welcome page appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               				
               
                  					
                  Note: Screens may vary based on different operating systems.
                     Please follow the online instructions. For Windows Vista,
                     the User Account Control dialog box appears.
                     Click Continue to obtain permission to run
                     MVT.
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Click Next. The End
                     User License Agreement page appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Click I Agree to accept the license
                  agreement. McAfee Virtual Technician checks your computer for installed
                  McAfee products and the operating system. The Running
                     McAfee Virtual Technician page appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Once MVT completes checking your computer, the Result page appears.
                  The AutoFix option is selected by default.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Click Next to fix problems detected
                  by MVT. The Resolving issues page appears
                  followed by the All problems fixed page.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				In the Result page, choose Get
                     More Detail and click Next. The following
                  page appears with the details of item(s) that can or cannot be fixed. 
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  					
                  Note: This
                     is the intermediate page that appears before the All
                        problems fixed page, if you choose Get More
                        Detail in the Result page.
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Select the required problem(s) from the McAfee
                     Virtual Technician can fix these problems pane and click Fix
                     Checked to rectify them with the McAfee application.
                  To rectify all the problems, click Fix All. The All
                     problems fixed page appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  					
                  Note: To see specific results, click the arrow. If you
                     have installed only the consumer products, the Link to
                        Additional Information page (for Home and Home
                        Office) appears. Similarly, if you have installed only
                     the corporate products, the Knowledge base Search page
                     (for Small/Medium Enterprise) appears directly
                     without the intermediary Technical Support Options page
                     (of step 14).
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Choose No for additional technical
                  support and click Continue. The Thank
                     you page appears requesting your feedback on MVT. Please select
                  the appropriate options to send your feedback, then click Close.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				In the All problems fixed page,
                  if you select Yes for additional technical
                  support and click Continue, the Technical
                     Support Options page appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  Note: This page appears only if you have installed both consumer
                     and corporate products on your computer.
                  
                  
                  				
               
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				In the All problems fixed page,
                  click the Scan products again link, if required. When the
                  scanning is complete and no issues are found, the No problems
                     found page appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               				
               
                  					
                  Note: Click Yes for additional technical
                     support, else No to display the Thank
                        You page again, if required.
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Click Continue. The Technical
                     Support Options page appears.

Supported home user products
      
      	
      
         		
         
            			
            
               				Latest
               versions of VirusScan
            
            
            			
            VirusScan Professional
            
            			
            Wireless Network Security
            
            			
            Easy Network
            
            			
            SiteAdvisor
            
            			
            Data Backup
            
            			
            QuickClean
            
            			
            Shredder
            
            			
            Personal Firewall Plus
            
            			
            Personal Firewall
            
            			
            Privacy Service
            
            			
            SpamKiller
            
            			
            AntiSpyware
            
            			
            SecurityCenter

McAfee Virtual Technician
      
      	
      
         		
         
            			This
            guide provides information on how to use McAfee Virtual Technician (MVT)
            to check your computer for problems that might occur with your installed
            McAfee products. MVT checks your computer to see if the installed McAfee
            product(s) are working properly and are using the latest DATs. MVT helps
            you in resolving any McAfee product deviations that may have occurred since
            you have installed the product.

SmallMedium Enterprise
      
      	
      
         		
         
            
               				
                  					Select Small
                     and Medium / Enterprise in the Technical
                     Support Options page. The Link to Additional
                     Information webpage appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  Note: If you select Small and Medium
                        / Enterprise for English version of McAfee Virtual Technician,
                     the Knowledge base Search page appears. If
                     you enter appropriate details and click Search,
                     the McAfee ServicePortal Search Results webpage
                     appears.
                  
                  
                  				
               
               				
               
                  					
                  
                  
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  					
                  Note: This screen varies based on the software you have
                     installed (sometimes you may find just a single option for additional
                     support).
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Click Finish and provide your
                  feedback on the Thank You page to complete
                  the MVT process.
               				
               
                  					
                  In the Session pane (for both the
                     technical support options):
                  
                  
                  					
                  
                     						
                     Click Problem
                           Log to view an HTML file that has details of your computer
                        and the McAfee product deviation detected by MVT.
                     
                     
                     						
                     Click Diagnostic Details to view an HTML
                        file that has:
                        
                           								
                           
                              									
                              Details of all McAfee products installed
                                 on your computer and their non-compliance.
                              
                              
                              									
                              System details.
                              
                              									
                              Product deviations found on your computer.
                              
                              								
                           
                           
                           							
                        
                        
                        						
                     
                     
                     						
                     Click Rescan to scan your computer again.
                        To return to the Final Report web page, click Final
                           Report.

Consumer products
      
      	
      
         		
         
            
               				
                  					Start Internet
                     Explorer.
               			
            
            
            
               				Type the URL http://service.mcafee.com and click Go.
                  The McAfee Services and Support for Home and Home Office page
                  appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               				
               
                  					
                  Note: If this page does not appear in the language you need,
                     select the desired language from the Choose Language drop-down
                     menu (upper right corner).
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Click Go to Technical Support.
                  The Technical Support for Home and Home Office page
                  appears.
               				
               
                  					
                  
                     						
                     					
                  
                  
                  				
               
               			
            
            
            
               				Click Start to display the McAfee
                     Virtual Technician - Welcome page.

Supported business user products
      
      	
      
         		
         
            			
            
               				VirusScan
               Enterprise
            
            
            			
            Common Management Agent
            
            			
            VirusScan Classic
            
            			
            McAfee Desktop Firewall
            
            			
            ProtectionPilot
            
            			
            AntiSpyware Enterprise
            
            			
            ePolicy Orchestrator
            
            			
            GroupShield for Exchange
            
            			
            McAfee Total Protection Service – Virus & Spyware Protection
               (formerly known as McAfee Total Protection for Small Business)
            
            
            			
            McAfee Total Protection Service – Firewall Protection (formerly
               known as McAfee Total Protection for Small Business)
            
            
            			
            GroupShield for Domino
            
            			
            SpamKiller Domino
            
            			
            SpamKiller Exchange
            
            			
            WebShield SMTP
            
            			
            Host Intrusion Prevention Server
            
            			
            Host Intrusion Prevention Client
            
            			
            McAfee Policy Enforcer
            
            			
            Foundstone
            
            		
         
         
         		
         Note: McAfee Virtual Technician also supports the
            localized versions of the above McAfee products.
